org.jclouds.crypto

Interface Crypto

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BouncyCastleCrypto, JCECrypto

    public interface Crypto
    Allows you to access cryptographic objects and factories without adding a provider to the JCE runtime.
    Author:
    Adrian Cole
